summary: This document is a trust agreement establishing the 2013 Butterfly Trust, created by Jeffrey E. Epstein as the grantor, with Erika A. Kellerhals and Richard Kahn serving as trustees. The agreement outlines the powers and responsibilities of the trustees, the management of trust assets, and the distribution of income and principal to beneficiaries.

keyFacts: The trust agreement was executed on December 31, 2013.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the grantor of the 2013 Butterfly Trust.
Erika A. Kellerhals and Richard Kahn are the trustees of the trust.
The trust allows for the distribution of income and principal to various beneficiaries, including Ghislaine N. Maxwell and others.
The trust is governed by the laws of the U.S. Virgin Islands.
